task.title: Getting Help
task.shortdesc: If you are having issues with Monday.com, multiple help options are available. Depending on what your problems are, you can choose a method that best suits your needs. Users can choose to either leave a suggestion, contact Monday directly, watch Webinars or tutorial vidoes, or read a written guide.

step.cmd: Click on the "?" icon in the bottom left of the page
An overlay will appear with multiple options for you to choose from, depending on your needs.
